Class ShopScraper

Object
ConceptScraper
ShopScraper
public class ShopScraper
extends ConceptScraper
Shopscraper class representing a specific instantiation of a ConceptScraper
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mathias Jarbekk, Thomas Johannessen, Joakim Jensen, Michal Kowalski
See Also:
ConceptScraper

    Constructor for a shop scraper

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    String[] getAProductsFeedbackComments()
    Searches the HTML code of a site sent as constructor parameter and returns every feedback comment given for the product
    String[][] getCategoryProductInfo()
    Searches a category given as url parameter to constructor, returning every product in the given category
    Double getProductAverageRating()
    Searches the HTML code of a site sent as constructor parameter and returns the average feedback grade
    String[] getProductInfo()
    Searches the HTML code of site sent as constructor parameter and returns information about the product
    String[] getProductSpecification​(String spec)
    Searches the HTML code of a site sent as constructor parameter and returns product specification for a certain specification category
    String[] getProductSpecifications()
    Searches the HTML code of a site sent as constructor parameter and returns information about the product specifications.

  • Constructor Details

    • ShopScraper

      public ShopScraper​(String url) throws IOException
      Constructor for a shop scraper
      Parameters:
      url - Link to target site for scraping
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws an IO Exception whenever user input is crashing with an expected string value

  • Method Details

    • getProductInfo

      public String[] getProductInfo()
      Searches the HTML code of site sent as constructor parameter and returns information about the product
      Returns:
      A string array containing product title, itemcode, price, stock status, feedback score and product description
      See Also:
      ShopScraper(String url)

    • getCategoryProductInfo

      public String[][] getCategoryProductInfo()
      Searches a category given as url parameter to constructor, returning every product in the given category
      Returns:
      Double dimensional string array, containing different products as the first index, and product name, itemcode, price, stock status and product description as the second index respectively.
      See Also:
      ShopScraper(String url)

    • getProductSpecifications

      public String[] getProductSpecifications()
      Searches the HTML code of a site sent as constructor parameter and returns information about the product specifications.
      Returns:
      A string array containing every single product specification found
      See Also:
      ShopScraper(String url)

    • getProductSpecification

      public String[] getProductSpecification​(String spec)
      Searches the HTML code of a site sent as constructor parameter and returns product specification for a certain specification category
      Parameters:
      spec - A string containing the name of the specification for a given product
      Returns:
      A string array containing every product specification for a given specification category
      See Also:
      ShopScraper(String url)

    • getProductAverageRating

      public Double getProductAverageRating()
      Searches the HTML code of a site sent as constructor parameter and returns the average feedback grade
      Returns:
      A double containing the average feedback grade
      See Also:
      ShopScraper(String url)

    • getAProductsFeedbackComments

      public String[] getAProductsFeedbackComments()
      Searches the HTML code of a site sent as constructor parameter and returns every feedback comment given for the product
      Returns:
      A string array containing every comment found on the page
      See Also:
      ShopScraper(String url)
